rezone.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ==============================================
00002 !
00003 !                REZONE
00004 !
00005 !   Reset particles
00006 !
00007 ! ==============================================
00008 
00009 subroutine rezone
00010 
00011   use treevars
00012   use physvars
00013   use utils
00014   implicit none
00015   include 'mpif.h'
00016 
00017   integer :: i, p, iseed2, iseed3, n1, j, k, ierr
00018   real :: Vdisc, qe_disc, qi_disc, me_disc, mi_disc, dpx, yt, zt, xb, yb, zb, xt
00019   integer recv_strides(num_pe)
00020   integer :: lvisit_active
00021   integer :: ne_reset, ni_reset ! total # electrons, ions to rezone
00022   integer :: ne_rez, ni_rez, npp_new, nremove, nremove_tot ! local rezone totals
00023   integer, dimension(npp) :: spent_label, spent_loc  ! local lists for reset
00024   integer, dimension(num_pe) :: nelec_pe, nremove_pe
00025   logical, dimension(npp) :: remove
00026   integer, save :: iseed1
00027 
00028   remove = .false.
00029   ! Find 'spent' particles
00030   nremove=0
00031   ne_rez=0
00032   ni_rez=0
00033   do i=1,npp
00034      if (x(i) < window_min+dt) then
00035         remove(i) = .true.
00036         nremove = nremove+1
00037         spent_loc(nremove) = pelabel(i)
00038         if (q(i)>0) then
00039            ni_rez=ni_rez+1
00040         else
00041            ne_rez=ne_rez+1
00042         endif
00043 
00044      endif
00045   end do
00046 
00047   call MPI_ALLGATHER( nremove, 1, MPI_INTEGER, nremove_pe,1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00048   recv_strides(1:num_pe) = (/ 0,( SUM( nremove_pe(1:i-1) ),i=2,num_pe ) /)
00049   nremove_tot = (SUM(nremove_pe))  ! total # particles to send
00050 
00051   if (me==0) write(*,*) 'total # particles removed ',nremove_tot
00052 
00053   ! Gather all spent labels on root=last_pe
00054   call MPI_GATHERV( spent_loc, nremove, MPI_INTEGER, spent_label, nremove_pe, recv_strides, MPI_INTEGER, num_pe-1, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00055 
00056 
00057 
00058   if (me==num_pe-1) then
00059      ! Replenish label supply if fewer spent particles than new ones
00060      if (nremove_tot < 2*nslice) then
00061         spent_label(nremove_tot+1:2*nslice) = (/ (new_label+i,i=1,2*nslice-nremove_tot) /)
00062         new_label=new_label+2*nslice-nremove_tot
00063      endif
00064      !     write(ipefile,'(a/(i8))') 'Recyled labels for rezone slice: ',(spent_label(i),i=1,nremove_tot)
00065      !     if (nremove_tot < 2*nslice) write(ipefile,'(a/(i8))') 'New labels for rezone slice: ',(spent_label(i),i=nremove_tot+1,2*nslice)
00066 
00067   endif
00068 
00069   !  Remove spent particles from local arrays
00070 
00071   npp_new = npp-nremove
00072   nep = nep-ne_rez
00073   nip = nip-ni_rez
00074 
00075   x(1:npp_new) = pack(x(1:npp),mask=.not.remove(1:npp))
00076   y(1:npp_new) = pack(y(1:npp),mask=.not.remove(1:npp))
00077   z(1:npp_new) = pack(z(1:npp),mask=.not.remove(1:npp))
00078   ux(1:npp_new) = pack(ux(1:npp),mask=.not.remove(1:npp))
00079   uy(1:npp_new) = pack(uy(1:npp),mask=.not.remove(1:npp))
00080   uz(1:npp_new) = pack(uz(1:npp),mask=.not.remove(1:npp))
00081   q(1:npp_new) = pack(q(1:npp),mask=.not.remove(1:npp))
00082   m(1:npp_new) = pack(m(1:npp),mask=.not.remove(1:npp))
00083   pepid(1:npp_new) = pack(pepid(1:npp),mask=.not.remove(1:npp))
00084   pelabel(1:npp_new) = pack(pelabel(1:npp),mask=.not.remove(1:npp))
00085   npp = npp_new  ! Reset # live particles
00086 
00087   ! Add new slice of particles to LAST CPU - domain closest to new particles
00088 
00089   if (idim==3) then
00090      nslice = pi*r_sphere**2*dt/qi  ! # ions to load per disc
00091   else
00092      nslice = y_plasma*dt/qi
00093      zt = 0.
00094   endif
00095 
00096   if (me==0) write(*,*) 'total # particles added ',2*nslice
00097 
00098   if (me==num_pe-1) then
00099      iseed1=-17999-itime
00100 
00101      ! initialize new ion disc
00102 
00103      do i=1,nslice
00104         xt = dt*rano(iseed1)
00105         yt=r_sphere
00106         zt=r_sphere
00107         do while (yt**2 + zt**2 > r_sphere**2) 
00108            yt = r_sphere*(2*rano(iseed1)-1.)          
00109            zt = r_sphere*(2*rano(iseed1)-1.)  
00110         end do
00111         !        write(*,*) 'seed, delta-r:',iseed1,xt,yt,zt
00112         x(npp+i) = window_min + x_plasma + xt 
00113         y(npp+i) = plasma_centre(2) + yt 
00114         if (idim==3) then
00115            z(npp+i) = plasma_centre(3) + zt 
00116         else
00117            z(npp+i)=0.
00118         endif
00119      end do
00120 
00121      ux(npp+1:npp+nslice) = 0. 
00122      uy(npp+1:npp+nslice) = 0. 
00123      uz(npp+1:npp+nslice) = 0. 
00124      q(npp+1:npp+nslice) = qi 
00125      m(npp+1:npp+nslice) = mass_i 
00126      pepid(npp+1:npp+nslice) = me 
00127      pelabel(npp+1:npp+nslice) = spent_label(1:nslice) 
00128      work(npp+1:npp+nslice) = 1.   ! set work load balanced initially
00129      ax(npp+1:npp+nslice) = 0.
00130      ay(npp+1:npp+nslice) = 0.
00131      az(npp+1:npp+nslice) = 0.
00132      pot(npp+1:npp+nslice) = 0.
00133 
00134      npp = npp + nslice  ! particles will get resorted later - for now keep them here
00135 
00136      ! add same # electrons
00137      q(npp+1:npp+nslice) = qe        ! plasma electrons
00138      m(npp+1:npp+nslice) = mass_e      ! electron mass
00139      pepid(npp+1:npp+nslice) = me                ! processor ID
00140 
00141 
00142      pelabel(npp+1:npp+nslice) =  spent_label(nslice+1:2*nslice)  ! Electron labels: 1->ne copied from ions
00143 
00144      ! zero potentials - should really compute these for electrons
00145      ax(npp+1:npp+nslice) = 0.
00146      ay(npp+1:npp+nslice) = 0.
00147      az(npp+1:npp+nslice) = 0.
00148      pot(npp+1:npp+nslice) = 0.
00149 
00150 
00151 !  Initialize new electrons
00152 
00153      do i=1,nslice
00154         xt = .2*a_ii*(2*rano(iseed1)-1.)
00155 
00156         x(npp+i) = x(npp-nslice+i)+xt  ! Place close to ions 
00157 
00158         yb=r_sphere
00159         zb=r_sphere
00160 !        do while (yb**2 + zb**2 > r_sphere**2) 
00161            yt = .05*a_ii*(2*rano(iseed1)-1.)          
00162            zt = .05*a_ii*(2*rano(iseed1)-1.)
00163            yb = y(npp-nslice+i)+yt 
00164            zb = z(npp-nslice+i)+zt 
00165 !        end do
00166         y(npp+i) = yb 
00167         if (idim==3) then
00168            z(npp+i) = zb
00169         else
00170            z(npp+i) = z(npp-nslice+i)  ! 2D
00171         endif
00172      end do
00173 
00174 
00175      !  Give electrons a thermal distribution
00176      if (vte > 0) then
00177         call maxwell1(ux,nppm,npp+1,nslice,vte)
00178         call maxwell1(uy,nppm,npp+1,nslice,vte)
00179         call maxwell1(uz,nppm,npp+1,nslice,vte)
00180         call scramble_v(npp+1,nslice)   ! remove x,y,z correlations
00181      else
00182         call cold_start(npp+1,nslice)
00183      endif
00184 
00185      work(npp+1:npp+nslice) = 1.   ! set work load balanced initially
00186 
00187      ! update particle #s
00188      npp = npp + nslice
00189      nep = nep + nslice
00190      nip = nip + nslice
00191 
00192   endif
00193 
00194   !  Now displace all particles back by cdt - stay in laser pulse window
00195   x(1:npp) = x(1:npp) - dt
00196 
00197   ! Update total particle #
00198   call MPI_ALLREDUCE( npp, npart, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00199   call MPI_ALLREDUCE( nep, ne, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00200   call MPI_ALLREDUCE( nip, ni, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00201 
00202 end subroutine rezone
00203
